辛うじて: (かろうじて) - barely; narrowly; just manage to do something
辛くあたる: (つらくあたる) - to treat badly
辛くも: (からくも) - barely; narrowly; with difficulty
辛く当たる: (つらくあたる) - to treat badly
辛み: (からみ) - (辛味 is ateji for からみ) salty (hot, sharp) taste
辛みそ: (からみそ) - high-salt miso; salty miso
辛め: (からめ) - hottish/salty/somewhat hot/kind of salty/on the dry side; strict/harsh
辛丑: (しんちゅう) - thirty-eighth of the sexagenary cycle
辛亥: (しんがい) - 48th of the sexagenary cycle
辛亥革命: (しんがいかくめい) - Xinhai Revolution
辛党: (からとう) - drinker/person fond of alcohol (as opposed to sweets); person fond of spicy food
辛卯: (しんぼう) - twenty-eighth of the sexagenary cycle
辛口: (からくち) - dry taste (e.g. sake, wine); a liking for sake/one who likes sake; salty (taste); harsh/scathing
辛味: (しんみ) - (辛味 is ateji for からみ) salty (hot, sharp) taste
辛味噌: (からみそ) - high-salt miso; salty miso
辛夷: (こぶし) - kobus magnolia; Magnolia praecocissima; Magnolia kobus
辛子味噌: (からしみそ) - miso mixed with mustard
辛巳: (しんし) - eighteenth of the sexagenary cycle
辛未: (しんび) - eighth of the sexagenary cycle
辛気くさい: (しんきくさい) - irritating (e.g. tone of voice); fretful; boring (e.g. work); tedious (chore, person); depressing; dark (e.g. story)
辛気臭い: (しんきくさい) - irritating (e.g. tone of voice); fretful; boring (e.g. work); tedious (chore, person); depressing; dark (e.g. story)
辛目: (からめ) - hottish/salty/somewhat hot/kind of salty/on the dry side; strict/harsh
辛苦艱難: (しんくかんなん) - (yoji) trials and tribulations; adversities; suffering hardships and troubles
辛辣: (shinratsu) - bitter (por exemplo, crítica), sharp, biting, severe, scathing, harsh
辛酉: (かのととり) - 58th year of the sexagenary cycle
辛酸甘苦: (しんさんかんく) - (yoji) hardships and joys; tasting the sweets and bitters of life; (having seen much of life) being well-versed in the ways of the world
辞: (ji/ya) - resign , address (e.g. opening or closing remarks), speech, words; ci (Chinese literary form); ancillary word
辞さない: (じさない) - willing to do; prepared
辞す: (じす) - to excuse oneself/to take one's leave; to quit/to resign/to retire/to leave post; to decline/to turn down; (as 〜を辞さず, etc.) unhesitatingly
辞する: (じする) - to excuse oneself/to take one's leave; to resign (post)/to quit/to retire; to decline/to turn down; (as 〜を辞せず, etc.) unhesitatingly
辞める: (yameru) - to resign, to retire, to quit, to leave (o trabalho de alguém, etc.)
辞世: (じせい) - passing away/death; death poem (poem written during one's final moments)
辞世の句: (じせいのく) - farewell poem; death poem; poem written during one's final moments
辞令: (じれい) - notice of personnel change (appointment, dismissal, etc.); wording/choice of language/phraseology
辞書に拠れば: (じしょによれば) - based on (according to) the dictionary
辞書を引く: (じしょをひく) - to consult a dictionary
辞書編集者: (じしょへんしゅうしゃ) - lexicographer; lexicographist
辞職を迫る: (じしょくをせまる) - to urge someone to resign; to insist upon someone's resignation
辞職願い: (じしょくねがい) - letter of resignation
辞色: (じしょく) - one's speech and appearance
辞退: (じたい) - declining; refusal; nonacceptance; turning down; withdrawal (e.g. candidacy); pulling out (e.g. race); excusing oneself
辟易: (へきえき) - to wince/to shrink back; to be stumped/to be disconcerted; to be bored; to be fed up
辣白菜: (ラーバイツァイ) - hot-and-sour cabbage (chi: la bai cai)
辣韭: (ラッキョ) - {bot} Japanese leek (Allium chinense); sour-sweet pickle of Japanese leek
辣韮: (ラッキョ) - {bot} Japanese leek (Allium chinense); sour-sweet pickle of Japanese leek
辨官: (おおともいのつかさ) - Oversight Department (division of the daijokan responsible for controlling central and provincial governmental offices)
辨当: (べんとう) - bento; Japanese box lunch
辨慶: (べんけい) - (after the name of a 12th-century warrior monk) strong person/person putting on a brave front; bamboo tube with holes drilled in it (used as a stand for kitchen utensils, fans, etc.); checks/plaid/checked pattern
辨當: (べんとう) - bento; Japanese box lunch
辨財天: (べんざいてん) - Benzaiten; Saraswati; goddess of music, eloquence, also wealth and water
辯士: (べんし) - lecturer/rhetorician/orator; narrator in Japanese silent cinema/film interpreter
辯才天: (べんざいてん) - Benzaiten; Saraswati; goddess of music, eloquence, also wealth and water
辯解: (べんかい) - justification; rationalization; pretext; explanation; exculpation; defence; defense; excuse; apology
辯駁: (べんぱく) - refutation; contradiction; rebuttal; disproof; disputation
辰: (しん) - Sign Of The Dragon , fifth sign of the Chinese zodiac (O Dragão, 7h-9h, leste-sudeste, março)
辰の刻: (たつのこく) - 8 am; the fifth hour; the Hour of the Dragon
辰の年: (たつのとし) - the year of the Dragon
